casebody.data:
LAW OFFICES OF ROBERT C. LEHMAN, a Professional Law Corporation, Law Offices of Robert C. Lehman, LLC and Robert C. Lehman, Individually
v.
Shawn W. ROGERS, Rogers Law Firm, LLC d/b/a Rogers Law Firm, Norman J. Manton, Jr., and Louisiana Citizens Property Insurance Company NO. 2018-CC-0878 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 28, 2018

Denied.
